mission.label: Public Good
mission.title:
A Public Good
for Korea's Ethereum Ecosystem.
mission.description: The Ticker is ETH is a non-profit group building public goods for Korea's Ethereum ecosystem through research, news curation, and community events.
mission.communityDriven: Diverse Ethereum builders in Korea share their insights and research. Anyone can become a contributor, and the community builds it together.
mission.builderEcosystem: We deliver the latest trends and news from Ethereum protocol, L2, and infrastructure builders. We serve as a bridge connecting Korean developers to the global ecosystem.
mission.initiative: We plan and execute diverse initiatives — meetups, study groups, hackathons — together with the community. A platform that turns ideas into reality.

cta.title: Build the Public Good Together.
cta.description:
Write research, curate news, plan events, contribute code.
Your insights become a public good for Korea's Ethereum ecosystem.
